**Bulk** L

---

This vial contains water blessed by a benevolent deity. You activate a vial of _holy water_ by throwing it as a Strike. It's a simple thrown weapon with a range increment of 20 feet. _Holy water_ deals 1d6 spirit damage and 1 spirit splash damage. _Holy water_ can damage only creatures with the unholy trait.
